tagline: Mobi Web Site Framework with support for MXit
name: fxPortal2
body:
### Welcome fxPortal

fxPortal is a 100% open-source framework mobi web site based on Grails. 

This project is still in it's infancy, but please be patient, development has just started and we have big plans for it!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
